import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; import { Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Row, Col } from 'reactstrap'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import e from './images/e.gif'; import p from './images/p.gif'; import w from './images/w.gif'; import c from './images/c.gif'; import h from './images/h.gif'; import authService from '../../../authentication/auth.service'; import customer from './images/customer.gif'; import { Card } from '@material-ui/core'; import axios from 'axios'; import base_url from '../../../api/bootapi' import authHeader from '../../../authentication/auth-header'; const CustServiceCardContent = () => { useEffect(() => { axios.get(`${base_url}`, { headers: authHeader() }).then((res) => { console.log(res.data); }); }, []); const url = `/profile/add-work/${authService.getCurrentUser().id}` return (

); } export default CustServiceCardContent;
